body:
Hey guys zez here and I just wanted to say I will be more active like my brother Cezbla he is training me how to use this site and how to be better at player vs player action on avicus and get some friends and clans if anyone ones to hang out and play with me i can't wait ;) also i just got told about this clan stuff so I am wondering if someone would allow me to join their  clan or explain what this is ;) ok well welcome me to avicus <3



Best regards, Zezbla
body_tagged:
Hey guys zez here and I just wanted to say I will be more active like my brother Cezbla he is training me how to use this site and how to be better at player vs player action on avicus and get some friends and clans if anyone ones to hang out and play with me i can't wait ;) also i just got told about this clan stuff so I am wondering if someone would allow me to join their  clan or explain what this is ;) ok well welcome me to avicus <3



Best regards, Zezbla
